values:
Since da boss didn't like me much when he hia'd me he decided ta work me to da bone. I been pullin double shifts through da roof but at least I got some money now. Anybody wanna go to da movies or mini-golfin or somethin? Maybe da arcade? I finally got some time off and I'm bo'ed.




(OOC: Fionals are FINALLY over *_*)

I find myself at loathe to inform the hotel that it is sub-par, but I shall be complaining to the management. Of course that shall be after I buy an entirely new wardrobe, I refuse to wear such...earthy styles.

Ok, Ta all of my friends, I'm gonna be in da bat'room brushin' my teeth until my gums bleed. 


UGH!

MY CLOTHES ARE GONE!!WHAT DA HELL IS DIS?

 

 

AND DIS

AND DIS?? AND DESE?


DEA'S NO WAY IN HELL I'M WEARING DESE YAH STUPID OLD MAN !!!! WHAT Da HECK WERE YA DOING TAKIN MY CLOTHES WHEN I SHOWA'D?

Operation revenge in motion.
Sorry Shigure, but I got a stupid asian prick ta beat up before you. Ya can wait your turn.

Well, da map is coitenly useful... NOT! Who gives out a map wit' no street signs? I'm glad of da bus tickets but where am I sposed ta go? I mean. I got no money wit me.  Ey' Yug. Can you spare some cash so I can get a new pair of socks? da ones I have now smell like old cheese.

Well, it seems dat life is going on as usual. Da food here really is great!  I'm kinda sca'd of da fact dat dis hasn't freaked me out yet. 
Well, it has but not dat much. I'm glad ta see Yug' and tha otha's again and makin' new buds is cool. 

I heard dat rat bastid Kaib's here too. I wonda what floor he's on. Bet it's a suite. 

..Moneybags

This is just a note in case anyone from <lj user="moksa_warped"> still has this journal friended.

It's now being used for <lj user="echoesoftime">  once I update the icons.

I deleted most of the previous posts a bit ago,sadly because I'd been considering apping Jou at another RP,but that fell through. 

All you need to know about Jou's previous experiences are, he lived in a castle with a bunch of wierdos and fought monsters for three months. He misses his friend very much, and due to a magical accident, the more he cares about a certain card, the more he can hear it. When RPing Para-style I tend to put the cards remarks in italics, but Jou is the only one who can hear them, so feel free to call him crazy so he can blow up at your character :3.

Also, yes, I need to change my icons.

My aim name is Setonokoinu at the moment, but I might make a less pairing centric one in the future.
